About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I did my Engineering in Electronics and Communications. I am passionate about sports and tech. I am currently developing myself as full stack developer. Roger Federer is my favourite sports person!!

Accenture (2011-2015)

SAP Consultant

Worked as an SAP Consultant in Accenture for about four years

Birmingham City University (2015-2017)

Masters in Enterprise Systems Management

I studied Masters in Enterprise Systems Management.

Creeda Ltd (2017- Present)

Founder and CEO

My passion for sports led me to the path of Entrepreneurship. I am the founder and CEO of “Creeda”- a smart booking sports platform. Creeda’s vision is to enable people to Pursue their Passion for Sports. We do this by building and energizing a close-knit sports community where players can engage with fellow players, teams, coaches and venues to promote greater participation in sports – benefiting individuals and venues. Creeda is an App that enables sports players to find players, sports venues, facilities, coaches and workshops, book sessions and make payment.
